name: Another Planet (sh1ft15)
description:
Submission to the 'Beginners Circle Jam #3'

Summary: You got 1 Gold in your possession, your goal is to travel to all the planets. Each planet require a pass to enter. What would you do ?

Tips: Click the 'Help' button on the top right of the screen to guide you through the game.

Control:  Mouse Cursor

Credit:  Background music 'Bit Surf by David Renda'  (fesliyanstudios.com)
